Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 7: Great Goals Check Seven Boxes
Description:
This is the seventh chapter from Michael's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the next few weeks, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

In this chapter, Michael Hyatt discusses the power of written goals and introduces the Smarter Goals framework. He explains how writing goals bring clarity, help overcomes resistance, and motivate action.

Want the rest of the book now? Make sure to visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
